description: Miro shares intelligence with the Council, focusing on potential foreign cyber threats as the source of BCI system instability.
Analysts discover a coded map in Halden's archived files hinting at foreign cyber-espionage, stirring intrigue within the Council.
The Council announces the formation of an investigatory committee to probe external interference, alarming citizens and heightening awareness.
Initial analysis identifies a foreign actor known for digital breaches, escalating internal discussions within the Council.
Media reports about possible foreign involvement surface, sparking public concern and discussions about national security.
